IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: WE ARE A GLOBAL LEARNING COMMUNITY THAT HONORS TRADITION WHILE EMBRACING INNOVATION. BY CULTIVATING CREATIVE, INDEPENDENT THINKING, WE FOSTER THE TRANSFORMATION OF OUR STUDENTS TO BECOME CITIZENS OF INTEGRITY FOR AN EVER-CHANGING WORLD. WE AIM TO BE A DYNAMIC AND DIVERSE SCHOOL COMMUNITY COMMITTED TO EXCELLENCE, INTEGRITY AND INNOVATION, HERE AND BEYOND THE ARCH.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE F, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 3

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SHATTUCK-ST. MARY'S SCHOOL ENTERED INTO A DUAL DEGREE PARTNERSHIP WITH BEIJING BAYI HIGH SCHOOL LOCATED IN BEIJING, CHINA. THE OBJECTIVES OF THE PARTNERSHIP IS TO COMBINE THE ADVANCED HIGH SCHOOL CURRICULUM OF USA WITH CHINESE HIGH SCHOOL CURRICULUM, USING SCIENTIFIC MEASURES OF EDUCATION AND MANAGEMENT. IT IS USED TO PREPARE CHINESE STUDENTS FOR INTERNATIONAL VISION AND HIGH QUALITY, LAYING A FOUNDATION FOR THEM TO APPLY FOR WORLD'S LEADING UNIVERSITIES. BEIJING BAYI HIGH SCHOOL RESPONSIBILITIES ARE: 1. TO PAY THE AMERICAN FACULTY A U.S. BASED SALARY AND BENEFITS PACKAGE, AS WELL AS A PER ANNUM ROUND TRIP AIRFARE. 2. TO PROVIDE HOUSING TO THE FACULTY AND ADMINISTRATORS INVOLVED. 3. TO PAY PARTY B AN ANNUAL SUM EQUIVALENT TO 25% OF THE BILLED TUITION FEES BEFORE EVERY SEPTEMBER 30. SHATTUCK-ST. MARY'S SCHOOL RESPONSIBILITIES ARE: 1)TO MAKE ASSESSMENT AND GIVE SUGGESTIONS ON BEIJING BAYI HIGH SCHOOL'S EQUIPMENTS; CLASSROOMS, READING ROOMS, IT ROOMS, LABORATORIES, EXAM ROOMS, SECURITY ROOMS AND OTHER TEACHING FACILITIES, SO THAT THEY CAN MEET THE REQUIREMENT FOR THE DELIVERY OF AMERICAN HIGH SCHOOL COURSES AND SELECTED AP COURSES; 2) TO SELECT AND APPOINT QUALIFIED TEACHERS FROM SHATTUCK-ST.MARY'S SCHOOL TO COME TO CHINA TO TEACH AMERICAN COURSES (INCLUDING AP) IN THE PROGRAM. TO BE RESPONSIBLE OF MANAGING TEACHERS FROM BEIJING BAYI HIGH SCHOOL, AND TO ENSURE THE TEACHING QUALITY OF THE AMERICAN COURSES; 3) SERVE AS THE ON-SITE ADMINISTRATORS THROUGHOUT THE COURSE OF THE YEAR. 4) AMERICAN TEACHERS IN THE PROGRAM ALSO HAVE THE DUTY OF TEACHING ELECTIVE COURSES IN GENERAL BAYI HIGH WHEN NECESSARY; 5) TO SELECT AND APPOINT THE ACADEMIC PRINCIPAL FOR THE PROGRAM FROM SHATTUCK-ST. MARY'S SCHOOL, AND THE PERSON SHOULD ALSO BE APPROVED BY BEIJING BAYI HIGH SCHOOL; 6) GRANT A U.S. ACCREDITED SSM DEGREE, UPON COMPLETION OF THE SCHOOL'S GRADUATION REQUIREMENTS; 7) TO PARTICIPATE IN RECRUITING AND PROPAGANDA OF THE PROGRAM; 8) TO INTRODUCE AND TEACH AMERICAN COURSES INCLUDING AP AND TO PROVIDE RELATED TEXTBOOKS AND ALL SORTS OF TEACHING MATERIALS. TO PROMPTLY SEND THE BOOKLIST AND DESCRIPTIONS OF THE COURSES TO THE RELATED GOVERNMENT AUTHORITIES FOR REVIEW; 9)TO PROVIDE DEMO CLASSES AND CASE STUDY LECTURES FOR THE PROGRAM TEACHERS FROM PARTY A AND TO HOLD LECTURES ON ACADEMICS AND COLLEGE ADMISSION TO THE PROGRAM STUDENTS; 10) TO ACCEPT PROGRAM TEACHERS TO HAVE SHORT-TERM TRAINING OR PROGRAM STUDENTS TO STUDY IN THE CAMPUS OF SHATTUCK-ST.MARRY'S SCHOOL, WHILE DETAILED TIME, PLAN AND OTHER INFORMATION TO BE FURTHER DISCUSSED BY BOTH SIDES; 11) TO OFFER PERIODIC CONSULTATION TO THE PROGRAM STUDENTS AND PARENTS INCLUDING RECRUITING COUNSELING, SPECIAL PROGRAM COUNSELING, COURSE COUNSELING, COLLEGE COUNSELING, ETC.

WE ARE A GLOBAL LEARNING COMMUNITY THAT HONORS TRADITION WHILE EMBRACING INNOVATION. BY CULTIVATING CREATIVE, INDEPENDENT THINKING, WE FOSTER THE TRANSFORMATION OF OUR STUDENTS TO BECOME CITIZENS OF INTEGRITY FOR AN EVER-CHANGING WORLD. WE AIM TO BE A DYNAMIC AND DIVERSE SCHOOL COMMUNITY COMMITTED TO EXCELLENCE, INTEGRITY AND INNOVATION, HERE AND BEYOND THE ARCH.
THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 IS NOT PRESENTED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING. IT IS PRESENTED TO CHAIRMAN OF FINANCE COMMITTEE.

MEMBERS OF THE BOARD SHALL ANNUALLY SUBMIT A STATEMENT TO THE SECRETARY OF THE BOARD ON OR BEFORE JULY 31 OF EACH YEAR, DISCLOSING WHETHER THE TRUSTEE HAS ENTERED INTO ANY CONTRACT CONSTITUTING A CONFLICT OF INTEREST TRANSACTION WITH THE SCHOOL OR WHETHER AN IMMEDIATE FAMILY OF THE TRUSTEE IS EMPLOYED BY THE SCHOOL.
EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD COORDINATES THE COMPENSATION FOR THE TOP OFFICIAL.
COMPENSATION IS BASED ON OUR OVERALL BUDGET ANALYSIS AND COMPARATIVE MARKET RESEARCH WITH HR DIRECTOR
NO DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC
